term.title: secular equation

item.text: In molecular orbital theory, the determinant of matrix elements whose solution leads to the set of energy levels of molecular orbitals for a given system.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1962 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
